description:
The Windows vulnerability carries a CVSS severity score of 9.8/10 and can be exploited by via specially crafted malicious MSMQ packets.

The post Patch Tuesday: Remote Code Execution Flaw in Microsoft Message Queuing appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Patch Tuesday: Remote Code Execution Flaw in Microsoft Message Queuing

description:
Patch Tuesday: Adobe fixes critical flaws and warns of the risk of code execution attacks on Windows and macOS platforms.

The post Adobe Plugs Code Execution Holes in After Effects, Illustrator appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Adobe Plugs Code Execution Holes in After Effects, Illustrator

description:
UK authorities have arrested two individuals for allegedly using a homemade mobile antenna to send mass text messages.

The post Two Arrested in UK for Smishing Campaign Powered by Homemade SMS Blaster  appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Two Arrested in UK for Smishing Campaign Powered by Homemade SMS Blaster

description:
Apple has released a visionOS update that patches CVE-2024-27812, which may be the first flaw specific to the VR headset.

The post Apple Patches Vision Pro Vulnerability Used in Possibly ‘First Ever Spatial Computing Hack’ appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Apple Patches Vision Pro Vulnerability Used in Possibly ‘First Ever Spatial Computing Hack’

description:
Redfox Security warns of multiple vulnerabilities in Netgear WNR614 routers discontinued three years ago.

The post Multiple Vulnerabilities Plague Discontinued Netgear WNR614 Routers appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Multiple Vulnerabilities Plague Discontinued Netgear WNR614 Routers

description:
BlackBerry says the Cylance data offered for sale for $750,000 is old and its own systems have not been compromised. 

The post BlackBerry Cylance Data Offered for Sale on Dark Web appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: BlackBerry Cylance Data Offered for Sale on Dark Web

description:
SAP has released 10 new security notes on June 2024 Security Patch Day, including two addressing high-severity vulnerabilities.

The post SAP Patches High-Severity Vulnerabilities in Financial Consolidation, NetWeaver appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: SAP Patches High-Severity Vulnerabilities in Financial Consolidation, NetWeaver

description:
Forescout's 2024 analysis of the riskiest devices highlights vulnerabilities and threat actor interactions across IT, IoT, OT, and IoMT.

The post Dangerous Liaisons: The Interaction Between Threat Actors and High-Risk Devices appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Dangerous Liaisons: The Interaction Between Threat Actors and High-Risk Devices

description:
The Supreme Court will take up Meta’s bid to end the lawsuit over the Cambridge Analytica privacy scandal.

The post Supreme Court Will Take Up Meta’s Bid to End Lawsuit Over Cambridge Analytica Privacy Scandal appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Supreme Court Will Take Up Meta’s Bid to End Lawsuit Over Cambridge Analytica Privacy Scandal

description:
Arm warns that CVE-2024-4610, a Mali GPU kernel driver vulnerability addressed two years ago, is exploited in attacks.

The post Arm Warns of Exploited Kernel Driver Vulnerability appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Arm Warns of Exploited Kernel Driver Vulnerability

description:
OT zero trust user access platform provider Xona has raised $18 million, which brings its total investment to $32 million.

The post Xona Raises $18 Million for OT Remote Access Platform appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Xona Raises $18 Million for OT Remote Access Platform
